title: Azir Bug
body:
ARAM Game Mode (Howling Abyss)
Me: Azir
Enemy: Vayne

I use my ultimate and then i walk in front of the soldiers. Enemy vayne condemns me onto my soldier "wall" and I get stunned. Isn't it normal for me to go through my soldiers, not get stunned?

replies.body: My bad! It should be fixed for next patch.
